event.title: Cultural Networking Event for Adults in Osaka
event.description:
For people who live in Kansai area of Japan but didn’t have a chance to get to know the local people…

EF Education First Japan, a Swedish educational company in Japan, is holding a cultural exchange event in Osaka.
1,000yen drinks&snack.
We invited Japanese people who are interested in foreign culture and the language.
It’s a casual get-together event at my office. Anyone’s welcome!

Date: Fri, April 13th
Time: 19:00-21:30
Place:
EF Education First, Japan
Osaka Ekimae Dai-3 Bldg., 30F
1-1-3 Umeda, Kita-ku
Osaka 530-0001

MAP

Phone: 06 6341 3338

The purpose of this event is purely networking between professional adults. Although EF provides alcoholic drinks, one should stay within the individual moderate drinking limits.
The participants must be over 20 years old.

Please sign up here!
event.address: Osaka Ekimae Dai-3 Bldg., 30F 1-1-3 Umeda, Kita-ku Osaka 530-0001
